publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1042 Cathy Jamieson: Breast Feeding and Returning to Work—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Executive on its adoption of the Scottish Breastfeeding Group (SBG) code of practice on breastfeeding and returning to work and urges all employers in Scotland to adopt the code and the SBG recommendations on its implementation.
S1M-1042 Breast Feeding and Returning to Work (lodged on 21 June 2000) Marilyn Livingstone*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*

S1M-1042 Cathy Jamieson: Breast Feeding and Returning to Work—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Executive on its adoption of the Scottish Breastfeeding Group (SBG) code of practice on breastfeeding and returning to work and urges all employers in Scotland to adopt the code and the SBG recommendations on its implementation. Supported by: Marilyn Livingstone, Mr Kenneth Gibson
S1M-1042 Breast Feeding and Returning to Work (lodged on 21 June 2000) Christine Grahame*
S1M-1042 Breast Feeding and Returning to Work (lodged on 21 June 2000) Nora Radcliffe*, Pauline McNeill*, Alex Neil*, Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-1042 Breast Feeding and Returning to Work (lodged on 21 June 2000) Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Scott Barrie*

S1M-1042 Cathy Jamieson: Breast Feeding and Returning to Work—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Executive on its adoption of the Scottish Breastfeeding Group (SBG) code of practice on breastfeeding and returning to work and urges all employers in Scotland to adopt the code and the SBG recommendations on its implementation. Supported by: Marilyn Livingstone, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Christine Grahame, Nora Radcliffe, Pauline McNeill, Alex Neil, Maureen Macmillan, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Scott Barrie
S1M-1042 Breast Feeding and Returning to Work (lodged on 21 June 2000) Irene Oldfather*, Cathie Craigie*

S1M-1042 Breast Feeding and Returning to Work (lodged on 21 June 2000) Elaine Smith*

S1M-1042 Cathy Jamieson: Breast Feeding and Returning to Work-That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Executive on its adoption of the Scottish Breastfeeding Group (SBG) code of practice on breastfeeding and returning to work and urges all employers in Scotland to adopt the code and the SBG recommendations on its implementation. Supported by: Marilyn Livingstone, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Christine Grahame, Nora Radcliffe, Pauline McNeill, Alex Neil, Maureen Macmillan, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Scott Barrie, Irene Oldfather, Cathie Craigie, Malcolm Chisholm, Karen Whitefield, Elaine Smith, Margaret Jamieson*
